about_the_game:
Welcome to Zlime Arena, the game that tests your strategy planning ability.

Player Amount : Currently, Zlime Arena allows 1v1 (You vs AI or your friend) & 2v2 mode.

Basic Rule : A match consists of 15 rounds. Whoever wins 8 rounds will considered as the winner of the match.

Drafting


Each player can ban and pick 3 Zlimes each. Analyze the strengths and weaknesses of the Zlime to make sure that it is good for your team.
You should pick the Zlimes carefully, as you cannot change them between the rounds.

Preparation


Each round, you will be provided with resources to buy the items for your Zlime. Some Zlimes are strong with certain items. Buy the necessary items for your Zlimes, or your team will be struggling in the battle.

Setting their target priorities is also important, as you can choose to finish off the enemy injured Zlime or aim the tanky Zlime with the stackable debuffs.

Arrange the position of the Zlimes wisely, so you could gain an advantage in battle. For example, Rod of Barrier can increase defense and magic defense to all allied Zlime in the back. This can make some Zlimes tougher in combat.

Battle


During the battle, you cannot command any of your Zlimes, as you have already told them how they should select their target. Just sit and watch how well your Zlimes perform in combat. Take the time to think how you can improve the strategy for the next round.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 and Ubuntu 18.04
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+, Vulkan capable
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Zlime Arena

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+) and Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable GPUs
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: A Zlime auto-battle strategy game that allows you to create the most powerful Zlime team. Each Zlime will have its own unique skill and stats. Equipping them with the perfect items can lead you to a victory.
